title: A pod of orcas have sunk a yacht in the Strait of Gibraltar
description: The pod rammed the boat's steering fin for about 45 minutes. Authorities were able to get crew members to land safely, but their yacht was irreparably damaged.

title: An exonerated 'Central Park Five' member will win a seat on the New York City Council
description: Yusef Salaam was one of five Black and Latino teens who were wrongly imprisoned for raping a jogger in 1989 before their convictions were overturned in 2002.

title: The largest musical instrument in the world is underground in a Virginia cave
description: Luray Caverns in Northern Virginia is celebrating 50 years of being a National Natural Landmark.  It's also the place that holds the largest musical instrument in the world.

title: Syphilis among newborns continues to rise. Pregnant moms need treatment, CDC says
description: Unless mothers are treated during pregnancy, newborns can sicken, die or face lifelong disabilities. The CDC is urging public health providers to connect more people to testing and medication.

title: An Alabama mayor ended his life after a website showed pictures of him cross-dressing
description: F.L. "Bubba" Copeland said he was under an "internet attack" after an Alabama website published photos of him in women's clothing and makeup. His death puts a spotlight on media ethics.
